DOC.brief_summary: The study is aimed to confirm that letrozole + PD 0332991 is safe and tolerable and to assess the effect of the combination on advanced breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Letrozole With Or Without Palbociclib (PD-0332991) For The First-Line Treatment Of Hormone-Receptor Positive Advanced Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inoperable estrogen receptor positive and HER2 negative breast cancer. Postmenopausal status. Tumor tissue (archived acceptable) available for biomarker studies. For Phase 2 Part 2 CCND1 amplification and/or loss of p16 as determined by the central laboratory. Acceptable bone marrow, liver and kidney function. Prior or concomitant treatment for advanced breast cancer. Other major cancer in the past 3 years. Important cardiovascular events in the past 6 months.
